class_notes:
(Same as MESAS 311 1)
This course satisfies the new Religion major requirement:- Tradition- Islam.
This course is about The Sufi Way (Islamic Mysticism or tasawwuf), the Muslim effort to experience God's presence and make society good. It focuses on South Asia (Afghanistan, Pakistan, India, Bangladesh) and the Chishti Order, the region's most popular and influential Sufi community. The focus will be on Sufi poetry and music.
